snippet: Lleyton Hewitt bade an emotional farewell under the Australian Open floodlights on Thursday as David Ferrer snuffed out any chance of fairytale final flourish from the local hero....
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt bade an emotional farewell under the Australian Open floodlights on Thursday as David Ferrer snuffed out any chance of fairytale final flourish from the local hero.

headline.print_headline: Hewitt Bows Out for Good, Murray Marches On
headline.main: Hewitt Bows Out for Good, Murray Marches On
